original_text: Only the land of the priests he did not buy, for the priests had a fixed allowance from Pharaoh and lived on the allowance that Pharaoh gave them; therefore they did not sell their land.
korean_text: 제사장들의 토지는 사지 아니하였으니 제사장들은 바로에게서 녹을 받음이라 바로가 주는 녹을 먹으므로 그들이 토지를 팔지 않음이었더라

sentences.original_text: Only the land of the priests he did not buy
for the priests had a fixed allowance from Pharaoh
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 제사장들은 바로로부터 정해진 식량을 받았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: and lived on the allowance that Pharaoh gave them
therefore they did not sell their land
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 자신들의 땅을 팔지 않았다
